Articles.Content: I only come for beer. Where is it damnit.
Zekes I blew your ship up, fight me!

... look nice...?

Its called a Mammoth for a reason. It's ugly but very sturdy and very reliable. Carries more fuel than 3 of my battleships and that is what counts all the way to. Laythe.

I don't have a ground persistence file... but I do have targets...

(did I anwser your question on the SSTo thing?)

Mostly, but what do you mean that "it can travel in both"?
I think he means they work in Atmo and Vac.
Yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhh Sabre got to a 70x70 orbit with 200m/s to spare,Total flight time 44minutes.

Yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhh Sabre got to a 70x70 orbit with 200m/s to spare,Total flight time 44minutes.

Did you land it?
Congratulations . I love SSTO designs. Especially ones with decent carrying capacity for missiles or extra crew pods.

Did you land it?

Yep with fuel to spare.Putting it up for download soon.
@Spartwo: The best part of that post is the totally unnecessary watermark on the confetti picture. xD

Congratulations . I love SSTO designs.

They are fun to make and its a great feeling to get when you get them into orbit

(especially if you game crashes when it gets to the point that friction starts to make the ship heat up with flames. Hence why you done see many pic of my ships re-entering)

oh yea reentry was impressive.

It turns out I was a bad pilot:P,no changes were made since the sub-orbital flight.
FIGHT ME. I DID THE ZEKES BATTLE. Im so boooored.

FIGHT ME. I DID THE ZEKES BATTLE. Im so boooored.

Ok im still doing the Battle with Camulus tomorrow but I will try two at a time

Do you have space fighters or ships yet?

Hyperedit?
I have hyperedit and i can make crappy peices of poo that fire missiles so yeah, i have a space fleet,

Ok you get first move

Gilly

4 ships

400 tons total

You set it up tomorow
Ok. How will we fight 2v2 or 4 v4 without multiplayer.

Thats exactly what I just said

4 craft

no more than 400 tons total
I know. How will we battle more then 1 ship at a time in a turn without multiplayer.

Ok. How will we fight 2v2 or 4 v4 without multiplayer.

Depending on how soon I get this application done for my social work major I may be able to do it tonight so go ahead and set up if your ready

I know. How will we battle more then 1 ship at a time in a turn without multiplayer.

You don't.

One ship at a time can only attack one ship at a time
I can make ships fastish so yeah.

I can make ships fastish so yeah.

Ok cool

Hope you understand the rules too
...Yeah, Im gonna go through a little development, specifically ground weaponry, I probably won't be fighting much.
I'm still in design overdrive.I recently got a good start to the raven mk7.
